verses.verse: A Song<WH7892> of degrees<WH4609> for Solomon<WH8010>. Except the LORD<WH3068> build<WH1129> the house<WH1004>, they labour<WH5998> in vain<WH7723> that build<WH1129> it: except the LORD<WH3068> keep<WH8104> the city<WH5892>, the watchman<WH8104> waketh<WH8245> but in vain<WH7723>. for: or, of Solomon that: Heb. that are builders of it in it

It is vain<WH7723> for you to rise up<WH6965> early<WH7925>, to sit up<WH3427> late<WH309>, to eat<WH398> the bread<WH3899> of sorrows<WH6089>: for so he giveth<WH5414> his beloved<WH3039> sleep<WH8142>.
Lo, children<WH1121> are an heritage<WH5159> of the LORD<WH3068>: and the fruit<WH6529> of the womb<WH990> is his reward<WH7939>.
As arrows<WH2671> are in the hand<WH3027> of a mighty man<WH1368>; so are children<WH1121> of the youth<WH5271>.

Happy<WH835> is the man<WH1397> that hath his quiver<WH827> full<WH4390> of them: they shall not be ashamed<WH954>, but they shall speak<WH1696> with the enemies<WH341> in the gate<WH8179>. his: Heb. filled his quiver with them speak: or, subdue, or, destroy
